page.title: 04A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: I wake most mornings at 7am.I lie in bed for ten minutes and then get dressed and go down to do my piano practise.After that I have breakfast which is usually cereal.Next I feed my guinea pigs, Rags and Chess and then it's time for school.My mum takes me to school. The day starts with ten minutes mental arithmetic and then assembly. After assembly we work from the timetable or at classwork. We have a morning break and an hour for lunch. School finishes at 3.15pm.When I get home I have a drink and then watch the television. Tea is at 5.30 and after tea I sometimes play with my freind Emma. I practise my violin and then at 8.30 I go to bed,but it is not always easy to go to sleep.
